title: Nero 7.10.1.0 {Sanpork}
description:
Nero Burning ROM is one of the best all-in-one CDR/DVDR application on the market.

Nero combines huge amounts of features in a compact and easy to use package. It handles disc duplicating and pre-mastering with ease, supported by a cover designer and even an audio file editor. The excellent GUI desing keeps all the functions handy and guarantees that simple tasks can be done quickly.

If you'd have to settle with just one CDR / DVDR burning software, then Nero would be it.

Why Nero?
Fast, reliable, and user-friendly, Nero is the best companion for your recorder. You can burn all kinds of CDs and DVDs with Nero.
Whether you want to burn audio, video, data, or backup copies, Nero 7 easily meets all of your CD or DVD burning needs.
